author: Paul C
title: Excellent boutique hotel that's good value
text:
Funky hotel with interesting groovy music theme, which works well since the hotel is located in the music district with many music related stores selling pianos, saxophones, guitars, antique violins, etc.
The hotel is located on a long, bright, quiet street that is away from the hustle and bustle but still within a 5 minute walk to the train station. Rooms are not big but they are well done with high quality fixtures and linens that make the hotel feel more expensive than it is. Complimentary coffee / latte / espresso 24x7 in the lobby is a nice tough, and you also have a coffee machine in the room with good audio system (it is a music themed hotel after all!). Bedding is very comfortable for a good night's sleep. Reception staff were friendly and helpful (spoke English well enough).
The hotel also has a small courtyard with a table for you to sit and enjoy the view.
I would definitely stay here again.
